summary: This document is an email chain from August 11, 2019, in which a Special Agent from the Office of the Inspector General forwards flight logs labeled for 'head count' to an unspecified recipient. The email indicates the logs were requested documentation, suggesting they were part of an investigation into travel activities.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.role: Special Agent, Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: The sender of the email forwarding requested flight logs for 'head count' from their mobile device.

events.title: Flight Logs Forwarded
events.description: A Special Agent from the Office of the Inspector General forwards requested flight logs, described as for 'head count', via email.

locations.context: Office location of the Special Agent from the Office of the Inspector General.

keyFacts: Flight logs were requested and forwarded by a Special Agent from the Office of the Inspector General on August 11, 2019.
The logs are specifically described as for 'head count', indicating they may detail passenger numbers or identities on flights.
The correspondence originates from the Office of the Inspector General, suggesting an internal oversight or investigative context.
The email was sent from a mobile device, noted with a disclaimer for typos, indicating expedited or informal communication.
